titles.title: Enhancing Mental Health and Suicide Prevention Through Campus Planning Act
Enhancing Mental Health and Suicide Prevention Through Campus Planning Act
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to promote comprehensive campus mental health and suicide prevention plans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Enhancing Mental Health and Suicide Prevention Through Campus Planning Act
This bill requires the Department of Education to encourage institutions of higher education to develop and implement evidence-based comprehensive campus mental health and suicide prevention plans.
